suggest.amasty\/customers-also-viewed-graphql: Install amasty/customers-also-viewed-graphql module to activate Graphql and Automatic Related Products integration.
suggest.amasty\/module-mostviewed-mftf-2: Install mostviewed-mftf-2 module to be able to run Mostviewed MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version
suggest.amasty\/module-mostviewed-mftf-3: Install mostviewed-mftf-3 module to be able to run Mostviewed MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version
